properties.areaDesc: Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 9 at 2:16PM PST until January 10 at 3:00AM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 kt with occasional gusts up to 35
kt and seas 8 to 13 feet at 12 seconds.

* WHERE...Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM.

* WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST FRIDAY... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
